subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[discard]]; to [[abandon]]; to [[throw away]]
# to [[skim]]
# {{lb|zh|Chinese calligraphy}} a stroke that falls downwards towards the left ({{m|mul|㇒}})
